name: AQUA CAT 12
notes:
At one time, the AQUA CAT was the worlds largest one-design catamaran class. (Later eclipsed by the HOBIE 16 & 18).
Although the original American Fiberglass Corp. was sold in 1971, a slightly modified version of the orginal AQUA CAT 12 is still being produced. (2002)
